short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: quick copy current chrome tab's title and url

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can click the copy-title-and-url item in context menu to get what you want.
你只需要在页面右击空白处，再点击 copy-title-and-url 就能复制当前页面的标题和地址

Note: System pages starting with chrome prohibit developers from performing this operation, so copying cannot be successful.
注意：chrome 开头的系统页面禁止开发者执行此操作，因此无法复制成功
